about_the_game:
A one-button rhythm mini-game anthology!

Featuring diverse art styles and a wide variety of Brazilian musical genres, hit every note and become a RhythMaster!

The minimalist and accessible one-button mechanic pays homage to other console rhythm mini-game collections – delivering a "jump-in-and-play" experience that will dazzle both casual fans and nostalgic enthusiasts of these franchises!

Enjoy the colorful, dynamic, and cartoonish visuals of RhythMania! To add even more variety, we’ve collaborated with different award-winning illustrators from Brazil!


Features:

  • Jump-in-and-play gameplay: In just a few seconds you’ve launched the game and are already playing a mini-game. The stages are short and fit perfectly into any spare time you have, whether it’s five minutes or an hour!

  • Dozens of exclusive mini-games: RhythMania features various stages with themes and musical styles galore. Master the rhythm by flying kites, replying to group chats with stickers, loading a moving truck, rescuing a ball stuck on the school gym's roof, and much more.

  • Supermixes: Challenge yourself with supermixes – mash-ups that combine stages you’ve already played into electrifying sequences that test your endurance and rhythmic skills.

  • Full joystick support: That’s right! Play with your keyboard, mouse, or your favorite controller.

  • Steam achievements: For those who love a challenge, unlock achievements by completing stages, beating your records, and conquering the game’s challenges!

    Dive into a world of rhythm – dive into RhythMania!
